name: lifemeter
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life meter
des:
Have you ever wanted to know what percentage of your life is completed? Welcome to Life Meter!

With Life Meter, you will be able to know how much percent of your life you have spent so far. With every answer, Alexa, also gives you a thoughtful sentence from one of the pioneers who have overcome all the barriers of society. 

Ready to know your life percentage? 

Ask Alexa to Open Life Meter, and follow the instructions!

Below are fun ways to know your percent: 
You: Alexa, Open Life Meter 
Alexa: Welcome to Life Meter, please tell me your age?
You: 28
Alexa: You have completed 30 percent of your life, Sir Shaw has said "Age is just a number"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
